    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AttributeService
    Service class for fetching user attributes from ScotAccount API.
    CustomOAuth2AccessTokenResponseClient
    Custom implementation of OAuth2AccessTokenResponseClient for handling token exchange with ScotAccount.
    HomeController
    Controller that handles the home page of the application.
    JwtConfig
    Configuration class for JWT-related beans and settings.
    JwtUtil
    Utility class for handling JWT operations in the ScotAccount client application.
    LoginController
    Controller responsible for handling OAuth2/OIDC authentication outcomes in the Scotaccount client application.
    ScotaccountClientApplication
    Main application class for the ScotAccount Client.
    SecurityConfig
    Security configuration for the ScotAccount client application.
    ServletInitializer
    Servlet initializer for deploying the ScotAccount client application to a servlet container.
    WebConfig
    Web configuration class for the ScotAccount client application.
